name: Scald (Chandy57)
description:
Scald - Made for Curdle Jam #16 with the theme 'Blowing Off Steam' 

Uh oh! You were exploring a volcano for the rare, fabled 'Lava Burger', when geysers started shooting steam! Escape or be scalded!

A and D - Move left and right.

Space - Jump

Platforms are different every time, so you won't get bored as quickly as you would've!(I can't guarantee you won't be bored at all though...)
Steam Pillars spawn more frequently as you get up higher, so be careful I guess?

(I apologize for the repetitive music I am not a musician by any means)
